post.title: man and his community
post.body:
how to build a community?

that is a question facing every man. 

here is how - 
- think about waht you can do readily easily
- list three of them, try one by one, see which one sticks
- until something works out
- then you have a community, keep building it

post.title: teaching Jerry - class 3
post.body:
the materials and questions we go through - 

- is creativity a good thing to pursue by our society?
- what should be the goal of education? what is the goal of Chinese education? what is the goal of American education? Good or bad?
- how is the situation of human society today? is there any potential trouble?
- real estate as a project
- romanticism
- prgamaticism
- Sartre, his teachers, and his book being and nothingness 
- his women strategy: what should be the goal? what kind of gf he should pursue? why? goal for his trip to shanghai, the big birthday party, the mistake of his friend.

post.title: then how about between two people, two nations?
between any two men, there exists a great thought or enterprise
post.body: class to start soon, and let's try to catch this great idea or entreprise. see how it works out. mentally prepared, that is all.
